name: Kurt's cruel adventures - Action Jump - Platformer
name_original: Kurt's cruel adventures - Action Jump - Platformer
description:
Help Kurt reveal the evil machinations in Saint Abyss.

dodge obstacles, collect powerups such as extreme jumping, invisibility and disable autorun
,jump to the top, beat the score.

Make your own levels using the ingame leveleditor and upload them to challenge your friends.

Huge endless game mode with more than 20 various platforms, enemys and powerups. Be quick, be precise, jump to the top of the prison.
There is no room to relax, the action continues.

Doodled Kurt needs your help, let him master all of the 50 levels. Use fling gestures to jump.
